summary: Angela and her young son Guille travel to the big city to see Leo, her father and the boy's grandfather, when he suddenly takes ill. However, they arrive to discover that he has just passed... See full summary »
cast: Maribel Verdú|Blanca Portillo|Jesús Castejón|Víctor Valdivia|Enrique Villén|Raúl Arévalo|Ramón Barea|Lorena Vindel|Natalia Mateo|César Cambeiro|José Luis García Pérez|Amparo Baró|Sebastián Haro|Luisa Merelas|Celia Bermejo|Ian de Muns|Ricardo de Barreiro|Akihiko Sekitawa|Chuen Lam|Adolfo Obregón|José María Morales|Álex Quiroga|Vicente Benito|Eva Díaz Obregón
title: Siete mesas de billar francés
